samples.name: Default Functionalities
samples.description: A simple and lightweight TimePicker component for JavaScript(ES5) for selecting times that is customizable to fit large-scale applications

samples.name: Time Range
samples.description: This example demonstrates how to disable the specific range of times(min and max) in a JavaScript(ES5) TimePicker

samples.name: Format
samples.description: Customizable TimePicker widget for JavaScript(ES5) with options to change the time display format based on the preferred culture for improved readability

samples.name: Time Duration
samples.description: A simple TimePicker widget for JavaScript(ES5) for highlighting a set of time intervals in a pop-up by adding custom styles based on you needs

samples.name: Mask Support
samples.description: This example demonstrates how to render the date time format in the input field using enableMask in a JavaScript(ES5) TimePicker
